org.apache.lens.api.error

Class LensError

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lens.api.error.LensError

  • public final class LensError
extends Object
    All fields in LensError class must be final and none of the behaviours in this class should mutate the state of any of the members of this class. Instances of this class are stored in implementation of ErrorCollection interface which is shared among multiple threads in lens server. Multiple threads can request for LensError instances stored in ErrorCollection simultaneously.
